task.en: I have the Japanese font Klee installed on my computer. Find and preview it.
task.zh: 我的电脑上有Klee这个日语字体。找到并预览它。
task.ar: لدي الخط الياباني Klee مثبتًا على جهاز الكمبيوتر الخاص بي. ابحث عنه واستعرضه.
task.ja: パソコンにインストールされている日本語フォントKleeを探し、それをプレビューしてください。
task.ru: На моём компьютере установлен японский шрифт Klee. Найдите его и просмотрите.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "クレー" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Klee" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Japanese" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "日语" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "اليابانية" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Японский" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' || grep -q "Font Book" && echo "True" || echo "False"
